name.ja: <ruby>宙<rt>ゆ</rt></ruby><ruby>上<rt>あ</rt></ruby>がりコスモス<ruby>姫<rt>ひめ</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "Jest of the Cosmos Princess" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: During a turn you have not activated "Post-Stellar Shower Princess Cosmos".

effect.en: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can Special Summon 1 Level 9 Galaxy Type non-Fusion Monster from your hand or Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position.
